Title: Easy Video Cropper
Description:
A simple application to make cropping videos easy for anyone.

- Automatically detects black lines
- Uses FFMPEG
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple application to make cropping videos easy for anyone.

The goal is to use the least amount of steps to remove black lines (or any other parts of the video) and keep the same video quality while reducing the file size.



- Automatically detects black lines
- Uses FFMPEG
